projects.title: E-Commerce Store Development Project
projects.description: A full-stack e-commerce platform using .NET Core, React with Redux (RTK Query) and ASP.NET Core Identity, enabling secure transactions and handling concurrent users with Stripe API payment integration.

projects.title: AWS To-Do List Application
projects.description: A full-stack to-do app with a Django REST API backend and a React (Vite) frontend, deployed on AWS (EC2, RDS, S3, CloudFront, Route 53), supporting hundreds of daily tasks.

projects.title: Peter Wei Portfolio
projects.description: A modern portfolio website built with Next.js, React, and ShadCN UI, featuring a chat interface and CV content.

projects.title: DriBag Coffee Website
projects.description: Launched DriBag, securing $5K+ in sales, acquiring a corporate client, and gaining 37K+ social media impressions.
